contents.p: My Email address is “sixthhappiness at gmail dot com”.

I welcome any thoughtful and cordial discussion of topics on computer programming and jazz improvisation that I have written about on these pages. I also welcome questions and comments about CAP and other programs I have written, and my harmonic analysis paper and jazz theory in general. I will do my best to respond to Email messages as promptly as possibly but I’m usually preoccupied with too many things these days.
To my family, and friends from the past and in the present: your messages are of course always welcome.
